file.name: swos-109-instantiation.yaml
file.content:
meta:
  title: "SWOS-109: instantiation cases"
cases:
- name: cross-document $ref
  remoteDocuments:
    a.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          MessageWidgetData:
            $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                type: string
  action:
    type: instantiateResolve
    config:
      url: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      type: string
- name: cross-document $ref within allOf
  remoteDocuments:
    a.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          MessageWidgetData:
            allOf:
              - $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                type: string
  action:
    type: instantiateResolve
    config:
      url: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      type: string
- name: cross-document $ref within allOf with a circular reference
  remoteDocuments:
    a.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          MessageWidgetData:
            allOf:
              - $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Action'
  action:
    type: instantiateResolve
    config:
      url: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              # $$ref intentionally omitted here
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      $ref: 'http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action'
- name: cross-document $refs within nested members of multi-member allOf
  remoteDocuments:
    a.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          MyThing:
            allOf:
              - $ref: "#/components/schemas/AThing"
              - $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/BThing"
              - properties:
                  cContent:
                    $ref: "./c.yaml#/components/schemas/CThing"
          AThing:
            type: object
            properties:
              aContent:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
          APrivateThing:
            type: string
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          BThing:
            properties:
              bContent:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BPrivateThing'
          BPrivateThing:
            type: string
    c.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          CThing:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CPrivateThing'
          CPrivateThing:
            type: string
  action:
    type: instantiateResolve
    config:
      url: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            AThing:
              type: object
              properties:
                aContent:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
                  type: string
            APrivateThing:
              type: string
            MyThing:
              type: object
              properties:
                aContent: 
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
                  type: string
                bContent: 
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/BPrivateThing"
                  type: string
                cContent: 
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/c.yaml#/components/schemas/CPrivateThing"
                  type: string
- name: nested cross-document $refs within multi-member allOf
  remoteDocuments:
    a.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          MyThing:
            allOf:
              - $ref: "#/components/schemas/AThing"
              - $ref: "./documents/b.yaml#/components/schemas/BThing"
              - $ref: "./documents/c.yaml#/components/schemas/CThing"
          AThing:
            type: object
            properties:
              aContent:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
          APrivateThing:
            type: string
    documents/b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          BThing:
            properties:
              bContent:
                allOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/BPrivateThing'
          BPrivateThing:
            $ref: "../partials/d.yaml"
    documents/c.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          CThing:
            properties:
              cContent:
                allOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/CPrivateThing'
          CPrivateThing:
            $ref: "../partials/e.yaml"
    partials/d.yaml: 
      type: string
    partials/e.yaml:
      type: object
  action:
    type: instantiateResolve
    config:
      url: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            AThing:
              type: object
              properties:
                aContent:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
                  type: string
            APrivateThing:
              type: string
            MyThing:
              type: object
              properties:
                aContent: 
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml#/components/schemas/APrivateThing"
                  type: string
                bContent: 
                  type: string
                cContent: 
                  type: object

Error: parse: parse spec: parse version: at test/resolver/swos-109-instantiation.yaml:1:1: invalid version: invalid major version: strconv.Atoi: parsing "": invalid syntax
